effect: Makes status moves used against this Pokémon have 50% accuracy.
synergies: Pokémon with low Speed or defensive stats to mitigate status conditions
Teams weak to sleep or paralysis
Items like Leftovers for sustained survivability
notes: Does not affect moves that always hit (e.g., Aromatherapy, Yawn) or moves that are not status moves (e.g., attacks, weather moves).
